subject: Re: [junit] automatically pick all Test classes?
msgSnippet: ... if you don t want to use this solution, JUnit-addons provides the DirectorySuiteBuilder and ArchiveSuiteBuilder (for jar/zip files) classes. -Vladimir --
messageBody:
> Try using the junit task and under it there is a batchtest element.
>
> <batchtest fork="yes" todir="${build.test}" failureProperty="failed">
> <fileset dir="${build.src}">
> <include name="**/test/**/*Test.java" />
> <exclude name="com/lse/test/util/*Test.java" />
> </fileset>
> </batchtest>

if you don't want to use this solution, JUnit-addons provides the
DirectorySuiteBuilder and ArchiveSuiteBuilder (for jar/zip files) classes.

-Vladimir
